solution_line_template: The family spent ${total_spent_ice_cream} on ice cream because {num_family_members} x {cost_per_scoop} = <<{num_family_members}*{cost_per_scoop}={total_spent_ice_cream}>>{total_spent_ice_cream}
They total amount of change they had was ${total_change_had} because {total_spent_ice_cream} + {cents_left_over} = <<{total_spent_ice_cream}+{cents_left_over}={total_change_had}>>{total_change_had}
They have ${pennies_value} in pennies because {num_pennies} x {penny_value} = <<{num_pennies}*{penny_value}={pennies_value}>>{pennies_value}
They have ${nickels_value} in nickels because {num_nickels} x {nickel_value} = <<{num_nickels}*{nickel_value}={nickels_value}>>{nickels_value}
They have ${dimes_value} in dimes because {num_dimes} x {dime_value} = <<{num_dimes}*{dime_value}={dimes_value}>>{dimes_value}

Without the quarters they have a total of ${total_without_quarters} because {pennies_value} + {nickels_value} + {dimes_value} = <<{pennies_value}+{nickels_value}+{dimes_value}={total_without_quarters}>>{total_without_quarters}
They have ${quarters_value} worth of quarters because {total_change_had}-{total_without_quarters} = <<{total_change_had}-{total_without_quarters}={quarters_value}>>{quarters_value}
